choices: Buy a ticket and take a seat in the big tent
Your a giant pudgy lion, you want to be a preformer
Your the ringmaster, Mongo the elephant
Sneak into the main tent to see what the circus is like
Check out the Carnival Attractions around the circus
1.content:
The circus is in town, and its one you have never seen before. The whole entrance into your small town was ment to impress, everything seemed so new. The trucks used to carry equipment were painted with scenes of of the circus, though the actual contents had been under tarps. It took a week or so for the circus to have itself fully set up and opened for buisness.

On a warm sunday morning you have decided to visit, most of the towns children are here, along with many adults who are likewise interested in seeing what is making such a fuss in a simple backwater town.

As you enter you notice most of the circus's hands are animals, litterally. They don't seem to be harasing anyone, acting very much as you'd expect a person to behave in the situation. A massive elephant shouting about the wonders inside the big top, various animals trying to get you to investigate the stalls and smaller exhibits.

There is alot to do... but what to do first, this might be the experiance of your life with all these.. creatures.
1.title: The Greatest Show On Earth

choices: Sit near the center, get the best view
sit near the east tent, where you smell "paint"
Sit near the west tent where you hear "roars"
You see someone try to make off with the cashbox
a fat smelly hyena offers to let you see the show for free, if you help out
11.content:
deciding to join the queue in front of the elephant you go thorugh you wallet to purchase a ticket, all the while watching and listening "See maveric, the worlds largest lion! See The one and only Scabard with the cast iorn stomach! SEEEEEEEE the grand matron of the tightrope, Gazebo, who has the grace of a bird and the flexibility of a snake
You wait and wait, the line moves slowly, between taking tickets and shouting for more buisness the elephant is taking his time. You see a few other giant animals that are apparently performers moving to enter the tents from a back entrance, you can only immagine what sorta show this will be
11.title: Wating in line for a ticket

choices: Take your seats and watch the show.
113.content:
"I can't believe he left me" sobbed Alice in tears still clutching the phone and scrumpled circus ticket, the dried tears had smugged the make up so proffessional applied.

"Shhh shhh shh it's okay" Comforted Flow holding her upright and walking still towards the large tent.

"But said...he...after...we" Choked alice one more time but the words deserted her.

Giving a venomous glare at a nosy couple who quickly looked the other way, Flow sighed and turned alice to face her.

She was her best friends and flow hated to see her like this after Alice's boyfriend split up with her.

"listern he's a scum bag and he wasnt good for you, manipulated you into believing that..... it's not your fault."

Looking through her brown locks of hair, alice sniffed and made eye contact. "...he's a scum-bag..."

"Thats right, i took you here to forget about him, so what we are going to do...hmm?"

"Forget about him" Repeted Alice more sure of herself and looking around.

"excactly, so come one lets go see the 'Big Cat' show before it starts, i know your mad about lions."

Giving a breif smile, Alice followed Flow into the large marque tent full of roars and growls.
113.title: Sit near the west tent where you hear "roar...

choices: The ring master asks for a volunteer
A muscular hyena walks out with a volunteer
1131.content:
After getting the tickets marked both girls wandered up into the semi circle of seating amongst the others, spotting a vendor alice feeling more herself brought some candy floss as the light began to dim.

In the arena blaring music began to play, a large anthro elephant holding a microphone in his trunk called out to the hushed audience

"Ladies and gentlemen...boys and girls, i welcome you to the Big cat show!" He boomed smiling with the applause given.

Now...a special treat here today for you, we have with us a legendary beast, soooo savage and so untamed it's name strikes fear into the very hearts of all who hear it.....

Im talking about the biggest king of all lions,,,,,,The man eater, the giant leo,,,,,ASLAN!!!!!

With a deafening roar, a very large, very ferocious...and fat lion bounded into the arena causing the entire audience to leap back.

"He's....so...wow its imposible to have lions that big" Breathed alice surprised how indimidated she was.

"yearh you telling me, man at times like this i..am..glad..to..be..wo'man..." flow replied with a humours grin.

Aslan, prowling around the very edge of the arean displayed his full bulky form to the gawping audience as the elephant man continued to speak.

"Now then, Aslan is no ordinary lion, as you can see to his bulk is result of his superiour reign but that isnt what makes him special...no...theres more."

"He's survived by eating his way to the top, the more he eats the bigger he gets."

"Thats kind of scary" flow whispered but alice didnt respond her eyes fixed on the lions dragging belly.

"But here's the far more stranger part, Aslan prefers to swallow his prey whole, yes whole and alive."

A mutter arose in disbelief but the elephant continued.

"well i hear doubt....but tonight before your eyes Aslan will shock and amaze you by demonstrating his ability on a volunteer"

The elephant man smiles and pasues to let this sink in.

"No way....this is getting to weird for me" comments flow about to stand up.

"I...Think its weird too but i want to stay" alice replies holding her arm.

"huh? your really believeing what he's saying...well okay"
1131.title: Take your seats and watch the show.

choices: They meet up with a lion who alice met over the internet
They explore more of the circus
11312.content:
Entering the stage to the applause appeared a boy though nervously dressed in what appeared to be a tight fitting one piece suit accompanied by a large and very muscular hyena stripped to his waist and resting his meaty hands on the boys shoulders.

"Oh my!" Murmured Flow liking what she sees.

Alice blushed eyes falling over his body. "You can. See everything" though her eyes kept flickering to the muscular hyena

"Ah this is our brave volunteer ready to risk his life just to entertain you this night, please give it up for him"

Wolf whistles and cheers echoed around the audience causing the boy to shy away try to keep what little modesty he had, whilst the Hulking form of Aslan stalked closer greedy eyes locked on the boy.

"And now enough talk, i shall let you all witness with your eyes."

The lights turned low as with a swish of his trunk the ring master cracked his whip, the hyena who grinned patted the boy on his shoulders and let him sink to his knees before backing off.

Taking its que Aslan with a low lengthy growl walked towards the boy who trembled feeling very vulnerable facing the overpowering wash of power, hunger, fear and lust from this Bulky lion.

Watching engrossed Alice found herself becoming sucked into the tension, this was all part of the show; he wasn't really going to be killed. right?

Approaching the boy the lion sized him up, rearing up on its haunches and placing a single meaty paw on his shoulders, the entire audience visibly seemed to lean forwards in silence as with a click the Aslan jaws opened incredibly wide, so impossibly wide.

Clasping flow leg, Alice sure she heard a quiet whimper before the lion engulfed the boys head fully into its waiting mouth, feeling flows hands quickly reach for hers both mute and total fixated.

Jaws, giant jaws dripping with saliva closed around his head, then pressing against the boys broad shoulders could see alsan’s black lips rapidly stretch then slip over them with surprising ease with both frightened and aroused Alice inside watching the boys shoulders distort and bulge the lions cheeks as they slid further inside.

Tensing, Alice squeezed flows leg for reassurance and to know that this wasn’t a dream, flow responded, though she was too engrossed to notice where.

Stretching its mouth even further, the fat lion sank its jaws down around the boys behind and tilted backwards, side on the girls could see his entire upper body bulging obscenely from the lion’s belly.

Gaping as she watched the display with increasing arousal not fighting the amount of erotic thoughts about that lion, her hand slipping from flows to delve downwards pursuing some need to distract and control the flow of desire feeling another hand doing the same to her.

With a noisy gulp the fat lion swallowed bringing the volunteer’s legs swiftly between its drooling jaws before vanishing completely as Aslan’s mighty stomach filled out having completely devoured the boy, who now only the barest of visible contours could be seen.

Throwing back its head and clicking its jaws back in place the Lion gave a loud belch, blinking as from a daze the audience let out as howl of laughter and broke into a frenzy of applause cheering.






Then speaking out over the crowd the elephant ring master boomed.

"That ladies and gentle was the Great King Aslan showing his ability to vore, remember ordinary lions can’t vore so please don’t go feeding the animals.”

The crowd erupted into laughter again.

“But Alas” He held up a hand “It is the end of the show but there will be more displays in half an hour… I thank you kindly for showing your support to the travelling fur circus, please enjoy yourself here.

Standing up the entire audience continue to shout and whistle, even you get swept up in the mood as the lights flash in beat with drumming music but realize to some embarrassment where your hand was and blushed… turning you saw flow acting the same, you both decided to act if nothing happened.

“So um that was a brilliant show!” Alice commented “so weird seeing that”

“Yerh tell me about it….so what should we do next.” Flow asked

(Choice one will be posted by me)
11312.title: A muscular hyena walks out with a volunteer

114.content: as you are about to buy your ticket the man in front of you leans foward and grabs the heavy box where the elephant had been putting the cash. The suddeness of his attempt caught everyone off gaurd and he is off with the box, carrying it heavily in two hands, lurching as best he can toward the exit as the elephant trumpets "STOP HIM" and in the process deadens you momenterily
114.title: Thief

choices: You take your free ticket to go see the show
1141.content:
You decide to be a good citizen and try to stop the thief from making off with the circus' cash box. So you quickly stick your foot out into the thief’s path. He doesn't have time to react as he trips over your foot then hits the ground hard knocking the wind out of him.

Moments later one of the circus performers (a very large Minotaur) has rushed over to the thief and pinned him to the ground. To your surprise the Minotaur then begins to swallow the thief whole!

You're distracted from this strange spectacle when you feel a large hand on your shoulder. You turn around and see that Jumbo the anthro elephant ringmaster is now standing right behind you.

"Thanks for your help." Jumbo says in a large and deep voice. He then hands you a small piece of paper and says, "Here's a free ticket to tonight's show." The ringmaster then walks away and continues to sell tickets.

You turn around to look at the Minotaur and the thief but you soon realize that the thief is nowhere in sight. All you see is the Minotaur sitting on the floor rubbing his bulging gut as he lets out a huge belch.
1141.title: You Stop The Thief

choices: You're male, try and talk/reason with him
11412.content: Walking up to the minotaur, you find that as he gets up, his stomach seems to bulge out for a second, the minotaur missing his step and falling over, groaning as he hit the ground. You know what happened to the theif and you happen to have quite a few people that you want to get rid of, but how are you going to do it?
11412.title: Taking advantage of the situation

choices: Pretend to be attracted to him
Get the hell out of there!
114122.content: You are 5 foot 9, about average in height and have sandy blond hair, brown eyes and a ok tan. You aren't too muscular, but that doesn't stop you from helping the big guy up from the floor. "Thank you," the big bull says, his voice reminding you of Andre the giant, but deeper. "No problem", you say, slightly out of breath from helping him up. Wiping the sweat from your forhead you look at the big guy and say, "You're a pretty fast eater, aren't you?", which turns out to be the wrong thing to say. His face turning from slightly friendly to more of a angry look, he says in a equally unpleasent tone, "So what if I am? You wouldn't happen to be trying to blackmail me and get me to do something for you, would you?", cracking his knuckles. Uh oh, bad move. What do you do?
114122.title: Talking isn't going so good

1141221.content:
"Oh, well", you say in a slightly frightened tone, trying to con your way out of this, hoping the guy wasn't against homosexuals too badly (not that you are), "I, I'm kind of, attracted to guys who can,", remembering when your pants were nearly pulled down in front of the whole school when you were fifteen to give the desired blush, "Can, eat a lot", making the last part as quiet as possible while letting him hear it. And by the look on his face, it looks like you sucsessfully pulled off the image of a bashfull homosexual man with a slightly strange fetish. A little too well though as you soon find out.

Looking at your blush, the minotaur smiles and says, "Really? Hm, well, I have to say, I'm flattered", letting his hands drop. "Sucsess!", you think to yourself, "Now he'll politely say that he's straight, has a wife, or even a boyfriend and I'll be off the hook", keeping your face seperate from these thoughts (damn, you should have become an actor).

These thought are dashed from your mind as his hands don't drop to the owner's side, but to your shoulders, the minotaur saying, "So flattered that I'm going to do something nice for you. Pick out someone, and I'll eat them, just for your enjoyment", gesturing to the crowd of people coming in. You are filled with terror as you realize that not only is this guy gay, but he now thinks that you are attracted to him. And he wants you to pick out some people for him to eat! What do you do?
1141221.title: Plan worked a bit too well

choices: Best not. It would attract too much attention to you.
11412212.content:
"Ok, calm down, think, there has to be a way around this", you think to yourself. Then, it hits you. "Well, I did see a guy get inside that you might like to eat", prenteding to be bashful again. Smiling down at you, the big guy says, "Well, if that's the case, meet me inside and make sure you see where he sits soo we don't have to go looking for him till it's my turn in the show, or I just might eat you", laughing at the last part to signal it was a joke. Nerviously, you laugh back, hoping that you can find him.

The guy you're thinking of is Jeff Micalsky, a cop who uses any oppertunity he gets to make you look like the worst guy in the world and gets all the ladies. He's done this since you two were in highschool. Looking back to your space in the line-up, you see that it has been stolen by a fat human man that isn't high on your like list. "Want me to eat him too?", the minotaur askes you. You answer...
11412212.title: Maybe this isn't so bad

114122121.content:
You decide to take advantage of this unique opportunity to get rid of people who piss you off forever. After all, this fat guy cut you in the line. Besides, the minotaur will love to eat him, as he would be a Gusher! It works out for all... Well, not the fat man; he will suffer the most intense pain imaginable, and the only reprieve he'll face is when he dies! Ooh! You're gonna be present to witness the poor guy being squeezed out of the minotaurs butt!

"EAT HIM!! EAT HIM!!" You scream, pointing at the man, "I HATE HIM!!"

The man looks from you to the advancing minotaur with genuine fear in his eyes.
114122121.title: Um, if you want to.

choices: The Hyena has him by his shirt tails
The Unicorn  almost has him in his clutches
1142.content:
The thief is managing to keep a decent pace, but the heavy box is naturally hard to steal, if the elephant could carry it its not likely to be under a hundred pounds


After about a half a minute you see two apparent performers start to chase him, one looks like a white equine on two legs, and a horn. the unicorn is apparently a bit faster than the other persuer, a muscular hyena wearing a sword belt, he draws his sword and looks as though he isn't here to "Capture." the chasers make you mufle a scream, they could kill the guy, even if they werent' trying to with that size and power.
The thief starts to climbonto a few boxes, your not sure what he is planning but secretly you wish him luck, the underdog will need it

the mans shirt rips and he eludes the Performers clutches

The muscular beast grabs the mans tshirt with his offhand and draws back the big sword as the man screams "NOO, you can't be!

The thieff ends up plowing into a lioness backside as she is leaving
114212.content:
Just as the heyna is about to stab with the heavy greatsword the grip rips, the mans shirt falling apart in the hands of the sword swallowing hyena. The thief takes the chance to run for his life, swining the box around and clobbering the hyena on the skull to slow the pursuit. The boxes damaged he makes for the main entrance again. Now not carying anything he manages to dodge the equine.
"Stop him!"Shouts the elephant! 'This isn't the clown act you two.
The hynea shakes his head and picks up the dented box, trying to put the spilled cash away. The man runs on, toward the exit..only someone is there ahead of him

He manages to slip between the big lions legs

The man races to the exit, running for his life, only to end up going out at the same time someone far bigger is coming in.
THe entrant is a fat lion guy, stomach sagging out,thick luxurious mane wraped around his body and tickling his navel
He is wearing dirty jeans shorts and nothing else. He is not as big as the elephant so the full frontall collision has the thiefs head slamming into the groind of the lion...

11421211.content: The thief is on his rump, staring up at the lion as he turns around. The lion calmly picks up the fallen cash box, puts it on the table, and then says to the dazed thief "<sigh> Okay do you want to be stomped or eaten?

choices: The lion's tail snatches collars him.
A fat otter behind the lion isn't caught offgaurd by the speeding thief...
11421212.content: You watch the man headbutt the lion crotch, the impact stunnes the bigger beast enough to let him slip by. Your about to give out a cheer but remember that it is a criminlal after all. Then you gasp as the thief hasn't exactly escaped safely..
11421212.title: Through the legs

choices: ...is handed over to the circus for proper punishment.
...is left with the otter, who seems rather hungry...
114212122.content:
You look on as an otter behind the lion, and not all that much smaller in either girth or height, reaches down to nearly flatten the thief against his sagging, soft stomach while the man is looking behind to make sure the lion isn't pursuing.
You wince as you can hear the man's muffled cry even from here, and watch as the otter picks him up, licking his chops. But before whatever it is can happen, the pursuing performers and the elephant in charge finally get up and begin to argue with the otter.
He seems to point to the man he's holding and then to his stomach, while the elephant is trumpeting a bit and pointing to the cash box. After a few moments, the heavy steel box is handed over, while the thief...
114212122.title: Finally caught, but what's the punishment?

1142121221.content:
The thief is handed over to the circus for proper punishment.

Will it be public or private?
1142121221.title: ...is handed over to the circus for proper puni...

choices: Stay in line and get your ticket.
Sneak off and see what becomes of the robber.
1142121222.content:
The theft aborted, the performers disperse and the ringleader returns to the front of the crowd.

"Nothing else to see here folks. The real show's inside, see the eighth, ninth, tenth, and eleventh wonders of the world, brought under one tent for the first time, see Ungsteen the Great as he tames Mighty Maverick, see..."

As the elephant charms the crowd back into place, you take one more glance back to see the otter hauling the would-be robber off into one of the tents. Of course, you decide to...
1142121222.title: On With The Show!

choices: Make an excuse about being lost
Make an excuse about wanting to join the circus
11421212222.content:
It's a shame to lose your place in line, but your curiosity gets the better of you. You wade back through the crowd, jostling some rather annoyed circus-goers who are trying to move in the opposite direction, and sneak unnoticed over to the tent where the otter disappeared. The flap is open and sounds of a struggle are coming from within.

When you peek inside, you're met with a chilling sight. The otter is alone except for two bare legs coming out of his mouth. His head is tipped back and his throat is rolling like a snake, noisily tucking down his mouthful. The robber's clothes are strewn about, discarded, which can lead you to only one conclusion -- you're watching the last of him vanish down an otter's gullet.

It ends with a slurp, and the otter napkins off his face with the robber's shirt, looking exceptionally pleased with himself. Then he stops short when he sees you, and his tone changes instantly.

"Hey!" he grunts, lugging himself toward you. "Performers only!"
11421212222.title: Joining the Circus

choices: he tells you to.. Strip...? EEPP
He strokes his belly and beckons you closer
114212122221.content:
You stare at the big otter a few moments before taking a step back "Sorry, wrong tent, i was looking for the ticket booth and thought this was it" the lie is pretty bad but you manage to say it with a straight face. You watch him shift slightly, lick his chops and pat his stomach.
"Boy are you a dummy" he says, making a purr as the bulge wiggles in the tight gut. he takes a few steps toward you , putting his paws together, clapping "Well you think you went into the wrong tent.. "he stops and fails to muffle a massive belch that sends a wave of spittle over your face. a face whipe later and he chuckles ">..because since you caee in here your going to have to.. convince me that your really lost "he snickers crudely while he pats his tummy "Afterall... " he lets the words hang...
114212122221.title: I'm just a bit lost

1142121222211.content:
If your not here to cause trouble how about you show me for good, strip of everything you have and let me see if you have some sort of contraband. He points at you and then his stomach "i might be new here but i know what can happen if your found here without a ticket.

As he looks over your body you get the distinct impression that he isn't being geniune on the reason, on the other hand, he seems to have done an excellent job forcing his will on the poor thief so it'd be better to go along, if he is happy you might not be going down the otter gullet.
1142121222211.title: Otter wants you to what?

The otter orders you to strip down to your underpants.

What does he do once you do that?
11421212222111.title: Strip down to your underpants

choices: The unicorn secures the thief just like a cop would, flattened to the ground
The Thief slips out of his pants and manages to escape
11422.content:
The thief contines to take a random zig zaging pattern to try to lose the two chaser furs. He seems to be doing a very good job at it. Managing to jump up on one of the wagons just as the hyena is making a lunge at him, leaving the buff beast stumbling. still the man seems to be trapped now atop the half full wagon.
The unicorn circles the wagon slowly as the elephant continues to shout "HURRY UP AND DOWN HIM CHARLEY! We got a show"
The unicorn starts to climb the side of the wagon but the theif is quick he pushes a crate off of the wagon and into the unicorn, forcing him to grab it lest it crash to the ground..
Just as the Unicorn is putting down the crate the thief pushes off a second, luckily the hyena has recovered and catches it as its falling. You look to the ticket taker who covers his eyes
"For god sake what is this a stooges short! Get him now, and don't let him break anything else!
At this statment the heyana snarls "When i get you your going to be walking funny" The thief turns around and kicks with one leg at the hyenas head as it rises, at the same time the unicorn leans up and grabs the other leg, equine hands squeezing around the calf, trying to drag him off his perch.... of course the man is sweaty. are those pants secured?
11422.title: The Great Unicorn Chaser

choices: You look away before anything happens.
You watch on as the unicorn begins to eat the thief.
114221.content:
The unicorn (Charley, had the elephant called him?) finally manages to get a good, solid grip on the thief's wriggling calf and tugs him back, showing a good deal of strength in that tall, equine form. The man gives a grunt and shouts a few unintelligable words before the unicorn pins him down on the ground, the lockbox of money being pushed to the side.
You slowly approach, trying to see what happens. The hyena who'd also been chasing him looks a bit disappointed, and you can see Charley atop the squirming man, keeping him firmly pinned, one big hand gripping around both of the man's wrists.
"This isn't your lucky day, I'm afraid. Mongo over there is in a hurry, and that means I get to have lunch." The unicorn grins as the man's eyes go wide and he struggles faster, screaming.
114221.title: The Unicorn Gets His Prize

choices: Mongo Shouts "No time for that now, get to work, plan b"
1142212.content:
The man lands a heavy kick on the unicorns thigh as he is lifted, sweaty body hard to grabble and keep pinned. The unicorn snarls and brigs up his knee, hitting the thief in a very sensitive area, and stunning him for the moment. The thief hardly resists as charly opens the great equine maw and stretches it over the theifs head, the stunning starts to wear of but the mans head is now burrowed in the unicorns long snout, starting to kick annd struggle again but this time the unicorns free hand is ready grabing one kicking leg then adding the second as it whirls nearby, the lips of the equine swallowing as the hands hold wrists and ankles of the fighting for his life thief.
The onlookers gasp, many shout and scream, a few run, most just stare.
Charley bites foward covering the mans shoudlers in a great gulp. the gape of his maw is impressive, you didn't think it was possible but he IS eating the man, alive!. Still the scene holds your attention raptly as the struggling continues, but this time well corraled but the "horise" soon the man is no longer held by the wrists, the fingers just clench around the unicorns lips, trying to pull his tors back out despertly. The horrible fate makes you feel like your watching a car wreck
1142212.title: thivery deserves captial puishment

choices: Charley is insubordinate, he continues to eat, causing a stir
The Troup goes about implimenting the plan, and precautions
11422121.content:
Mongo shouts "everyone STOP" and it happens.
"My freinds, my customers, what you see here is justice in our buisness, thievery is a cardinal sin where all is shared. It is our way. Now that you are all terrified, fine, but you are going to listen. I don't like to lose buisness and now I have a show to put on and you are all going to see it, one way or the other. If you ignore this incident "Spit him out Charley, we will put him in our jail cell" You see Mongo give a paw signle to the unicorn.
"if you all go about your buisness and enjoy our show like everyone planed to we will all have a good laugh and go home happy, if you all are going to run and scatter, causing a panic i will have to enforce Carnie law."
As Mongo is talking the other troup members seem to be spreading out, covering the exits silently
"And that law will give you a much more personal show of the dark and hot side of our buisness... and your last look of it too."
Mongo's speach seems to have gotten the attention of everyone, the bellowing voice have a natural air of comand to it
"My assosciates have already started to prepare for the worst case scenerio.. for YOU!, The exits WILL be unlocked after the show, you have my word."
The hynea is visible pushing boxes in front of one exit... you get the idea these are far more dangerous than you had thought.... and maybe the best solution is to try to whipe the incident from your mind... its what all the others seem to be doing. one by one going into the big top tent, keeping there eyes on Charly
11422121.title: Plan B--You didn't see anything!

THe crowd starts to panic as they watch the Unicorn continue to devour the man. "Charley stop that right now, spit him out." Mongo yells. Charley continues to ignore him as he continues to swallow the theif alive. Charley gets down to the thiefs feet and pushes him all the way into his mouth. Charley lets out a mighty gulp and swallows the thief down. Everyone gasps in horror as they hear the horrified sound of Charley gulping. Charley feels the thief arrive in his stomach and starts rubbing his belly, feeling the thief squirm to get out of his prison chamber. He lets out a loud belch and turns around, exposing his expanded belly to everyone. Everyone starts screaming and are frozen in fear.Whats going to happen?

But you just stand there waiting for what will happen. Charley leaps at you and pins you to the ground, sitting on you with its powerful ass. what is Charley going to do to you?
1142212111.title: The tables turn on you

choices: Charley eats someone else and decides to keep you as his sex slave

13111.content:
You sigh and rub down your massive trunk with your thick fingers, pacing in your ringmasters office tent and looking at the schedule. Damn that Maverick, he'd screwed up the show. Always letting his stomach get the better of him. Of course, that's why you'd liked him from the get-go, but this was a bad, bad time. You stare down at the sheet for tonight and rub a pencil eraser over the lion's name and slot before beginning to pace again.
Just as your beginning to think you'll have to cut the show short or cancel it, you hear a loud 'Mreeeoow' at the entrance to your huge office. Spinning on the sound, you spot a huge black panther settled on his haunches just inside of the entrance.
You start and stare. Who is this? The panther, who's got a very big head for his kind, powerful limbs, and a slightly soft middle, is as big as, if not bigger than, Maverick! It just sits there, swishing its tail over the ground as you pad up.
"So, who're you? Some replacement that gluttonous lion called in?"
The panther just lets out another 'Mrreeeooow' and tilts its head. When it does, you see a collar around its neck, and bend down to take a look at it, the big cat apparently letting you do so.
You take a hold of the leather collar and read a tag there that says 'Pouncer. If lost, call...'
"So, what, you're someone's pet?"
The panther purrs and lets out a happy-sounding growl before licking its lips slowly. You get a sense that this isn't your ordinary cat, much like that fat lion, now. It hasn't said a word, so you can't be sure if it's trained or dumb or just mute...but you don't have much of a choice, nor much time left.
